overview: Priyatama (Matathi: प्रियतमा.... खडकाळ माळराणावर फुललेलं एक हळवं प्रीतस्वप्न[1]) is a 2014 Marathi film. The film is the story of Parsha and Gauri in a small village of Maharashtra in 1951,[2] who fall in love despite belonging to different social classes and opposite lifestyles.  Priyatama was released in theaters on 14 February 2014.
title: Priyatama
